name: axio
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wb(wi(wo(w0, w1), w2), wa(wi(w0, w2), wi(w1, w2)))

body.origin: |- wb(wi(wo(w0, w1), w2), wa(wi(w0, w2), wi(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin: |- wb(wi(wo(w0, w1), w2), wa(wi(w0, w2), wi(w1, w2)))

comment: Definition of 'or' (intuitionistic logic axiom ax-io). (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 21-May-2018.) (New usage is discouraged.)
